title: Code Review App
info_intro: Welcome to the Code Review App! Here's how you can use the app to review code effectively:
info_step1_text: Enter the name of the file you're reviewing and your name in the respective fields. The current date is automatically populated.
info_step2_text: Select the type of file you're reviewing from the dropdown menu.
info_step3_text: Click 'Add Segment' to comment on specific lines of code. Enter the line numbers, your comments, and select the type of comment (Note, Possible Problem, or Error).
info_step4_text: After adding all segments, click 'Complete' to generate a PDF of your review.
info_outro: If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Happy reviewing!
email_body:
Hello Samuel,

I wanted to share some feedback about the Code Review App.

Best regards,
